text:
I am using mod_proxy_balancer to proxy to 3 servers.  I have also added the 
directive to use the balancer-manager.  I think the proxy is working, however 
when I try to go to the Load Balancer Manager, I receive a page with:

Load Balancer Manager for localhost

Server Version: Apache/2.2.4 (Win32)
Server Built: Jan 9 2007 23:17:20 

However, this is all that is on the page.

I read about a similar issue with bug #36816 but I tried to run a test where 
apache was running on 8080 and my server was running on 80 so that I could just 
use the localhost in the BalanceMember parameter, but that still didnt work.
creator: angelo0000@gmail.com

text: Ignore this....I removed some extraneous config and it is now working
creator: angelo0000@gmail.com
